text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus hiratsukae is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Fumigati section. The species was first described in 1991. It has been reported to produce avenaciolide.
text.Growth and morphology:
A. hiratsukae has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below.
